## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugifycustompassmanager">DebugifyCustomPassManager</a> wraps each pass with the debugify passes if needed.

NOTE: We support legacy custom pass manager only. TODO: Add New PM support for custom pass manager.

Definition at line 229 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/debugify-h">Debugify.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### add() {#a3fcb5818d26eaf75c2b5a96903fd7cf4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::DebugifyCustomPassManager::add (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> &#42; P)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Add a pass to the queue of passes to run.

This passes ownership of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passmanager">PassManager</a>. When the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passmanager">PassManager</a> is destroyed, the pass will be destroyed as well, so there is no need to delete the pass. This may even destroy the pass right away if it is found to be redundant. This implies that all passes MUST be allocated with &#39;new&#39;.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/debugify-h/#l00238">238</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/debugify-h">Debugify.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
